title: Exception thrown when exporting data from table with highlight/map
description:
Description: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from the attached report.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a table to the report, which includes a group row with a highlight rule and a map rule.
2. Preview the attached report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table.
OB: When attempting to export data from the table, an exception is thrown.
EB: There should be no exception thrown when exporting data from the table with highlight/map.
SR:
1. Add a table to the report, including a group row with a highlight rule and a map rule.
2. Preview the report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table and verify that no exception is thrown.
